descp2: The replacement character codepoint to be used in place of any invalid input when `errors='replace'`. Any valid unicode codepoint may be used. The default value is the default unicode replacement character which is 0xFFFD (U+65533).

The replacement character codepoint to be used in place of any invalid input when `errors='replace'`. Any valid unicode codepoint may be used. The default value is the default unicode replacement character which is 0xFFFD (U+65533).
